MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK1 postcode area of Camelon. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 11:22AM. Our engineers have arrived at the Sunnybrae substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25PM on 24 October 2020.
